# Hytale Server Documentation

> Unofficial community documentation for running, configuring, and modding Hytale dedicated servers.

This is a community-maintained documentation site created through analysis and decompilation of the Hytale server. Hytale is currently in early access, so content may change frequently.

## About This Documentation

- **Type**: Technical documentation for Hytale server administration and plugin development
- **Audience**: Server administrators, plugin developers, and modders
- **Technology**: Built with Astro/Starlight, hosted on Cloudflare
- **Status**: Work in progress, unofficial community project

## Quick Facts

- **Default Port**: 5520 (UDP with QUIC protocol)
- **Java Version Required**: Java 25 or higher (Adoptium/Temurin recommended)
- **Minimum RAM**: 4GB (8GB+ recommended for larger servers)
- **Architecture**: x64 or arm64 supported

## Documentation Structure

### Getting Started
- [Introduction](/getting-started/introduction/): Overview of Hytale servers, system requirements, and quick start
- [Installation](/getting-started/installation/): Step-by-step Java 25 installation and server setup

### Server Configuration
- [Server Index](/server/): Configuration files overview
- [Server Settings](/server/server-config/): config.json settings (ServerName, MOTD, MaxPlayers, rate limiting)
- [World Configuration](/server/world-config/): World-specific settings, game modes, PvP, spawn behavior
- [Authentication](/server/authentication/): Auth modes (authenticated, offline, insecure), OAuth 2.0 device flow
- [Performance Tuning](/server/performance/): Memory allocation, JVM garbage collection (G1GC), view distance
- [Running as Service](/server/service/): systemd (Linux) and NSSM (Windows) setup
- [Backups](/server/backups/): Automatic backup configuration with ZIP archives

### Modding & Plugin Development
- [Modding Overview](/modding/overview/): Architecture, plugin locations, key concepts
- [Examples & Patterns](/modding/examples/): Complete code examples for plugin development

#### Plugin System
- [Plugin System](/modding/plugins/plugin-system/): manifest.json structure, JavaPlugin class, lifecycle methods
- [Event System](/modding/plugins/events/): Sync/async events, priorities, cancellable events, custom events
- [Command System](/modding/plugins/commands/): AbstractCommand, required/optional/flag arguments, subcommands
- [Permissions](/modding/plugins/permissions/): PermissionHolder, groups, wildcards, negation
- [Tasks](/modding/plugins/tasks/): Async task scheduling with CompletableFuture

#### Entity-Component-System (ECS)
- [ECS Overview](/modding/ecs/): Entity-Component-System architecture explanation
- [Component System](/modding/ecs/components/): Creating components, Ref entities, systems, resources
- [Entity Stats](/modding/ecs/entity-stats/): Health, stamina, mana, custom attributes
- [Physics](/modding/ecs/physics/): Physics simulation and collision
- [Player Persistence](/modding/ecs/player-persistence/): Player data storage

#### Gameplay Systems
- [Systems Overview](/modding/systems/): Core gameplay systems
- [Damage System](/modding/systems/damage/): Health, damage types, damage sources, death handling
- [Movement](/modding/systems/movement/): Entity velocity, locomotion states
- [Mounts](/modding/systems/mounts/): Rider-mount relationships
- [Interactions](/modding/systems/interactions/): Player/entity interactions
- [Projectiles](/modding/systems/projectiles/): Projectile spawning and physics
- [Entity Effects](/modding/systems/entity-effects/): Status effects, buffs, debuffs

#### NPC & AI System
- [NPC Overview](/modding/npc-ai/): NPCPlugin, roles, AI components
- [Blackboard System](/modding/npc-ai/blackboard/): Shared AI memory
- [Decision Makers](/modding/npc-ai/decision-makers/): State evaluation and conditions
- [Instructions](/modding/npc-ai/instructions/): Behavioral building blocks
- [Navigation](/modding/npc-ai/navigation/): A* pathfinding and movement
- [Roles](/modding/npc-ai/roles/): High-level NPC behavior definitions
- [Animations](/modding/npc-ai/animations/): Animation state management

#### World Generation
- [Worldgen Overview](/modding/worldgen/): Zones, biomes, caves architecture
- [Zones](/modding/worldgen/zones/): Large-scale region configuration
- [Biomes](/modding/worldgen/biomes/): Terrain characteristics, block placement
- [Caves](/modding/worldgen/caves/): Underground cave generation
- [Live Editing](/modding/worldgen/live/): Real-time world generation editing

#### Content & Assets
- [Content Overview](/modding/content/): Assets, items, prefabs, world generation
- [Assets & Registry](/modding/content/assets/): Custom content registration
- [Inventory & Items](/modding/content/inventory/): Player inventory management
- [Prefabs](/modding/content/prefabs/): Structure creation and placement
- [Fluids](/modding/content/fluid/): Fluid system and flow
- [Time System](/modding/content/time/): Day/night cycle, moon phases
- [Lighting](/modding/content/lighting/): Chunk lighting system

#### Networking
- [Networking Overview](/modding/networking/): QUIC/UDP protocol, Netty, Zstd compression
- [Protocol & Packets](/modding/networking/protocol/): Wire format, packet structure, interception

#### Spawning & Flocking
- [Spawning System](/modding/spawning/): Entity spawning configuration
- [Flock System](/modding/flock/): Group behavior management

### GUI System
- [GUI Overview](/gui/): Windows, Pages, HUD architecture
- [Windows System](/gui/windows/): Inventory-based UIs (containers, crafting)
- [Pages System](/gui/pages/): Custom dialogs, menus, overlays
- [HUD System](/gui/hud/): Persistent on-screen elements
- [UI Builders](/gui/builders/): UICommandBuilder and UIEventBuilder

## Key Technical Details

### Server Launch Command
```bash
java -Xms4G -Xmx4G -jar HytaleServer.jar --assets ../HytaleAssets
```

### Important Command-Line Arguments
- `--assets <Path>`: Path to assets directory or .zip file
- `-b, --bind <Address>`: Address and port (default: 0.0.0.0:5520)
- `-t, --transport <Type>`: TCP or QUIC (default: QUIC)
- `--auth-mode <Mode>`: AUTHENTICATED, OFFLINE, or INSECURE
- `--mods <Paths>`: Additional mod directories
- `--backup`: Enable automatic backups
- `--backup-dir <Path>`: Backup directory
- `--backup-frequency <Minutes>`: Backup interval (default: 30)

### Plugin Manifest (manifest.json)
```json
{
  "Group": "com.example",
  "Name": "MyPlugin",
  "Version": "1.0.0",
  "Main": "com.example.MyPlugin",
  "ServerVersion": ">=0.0.1",
  "Dependencies": {},
  "IncludesAssetPack": false
}
```

### Plugin Lifecycle
1. `setup()` - Register components, commands, events
2. `start()` - Start background tasks, initialize state
3. `shutdown()` - Clean up resources, save data

### Network Protocol Characteristics
- Byte Order: Little-endian
- Compression: Zstd for large packets
- VarInt: 7-bit encoding, max 5 bytes
- Transport: QUIC (UDP) primary, TCP fallback
- Max Payload: ~1.56GB

### Authentication Modes
- **authenticated**: Default, requires valid Hytale accounts
- **offline**: No verification, for private/LAN servers
- **insecure**: Development only, all security disabled

### Game Modes
- Adventure (ID: 0) - Default mode
- Creative (ID: 1) - Creative mode

## Community Resources

- **Discord**: https://discord.gg/jshWA2kRmF
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/vulpeslab/hytale-docs

## Important Notes

1. This documentation is **unofficial** and community-created
2. Hytale is in **early access** - APIs and features may change
3. Content is based on decompilation and analysis
4. Report errors or contribute at the GitHub repository

## Optional: Detailed Documentation

For the complete documentation in a single file format optimized for LLM context, see:
- [/llms-full.txt](/llms-full.txt) - Full documentation content (if available)
